common.err_resource: Could not load a required resource. (%s %s)
common.err_write_save: Could not open the save file for writing.
common.err_audio: Could not open the audio mixer.
common.title: Stunt Jumper
common.score_every_cat_desc: Actually, you can take them with you.
common.score_no_cat_desc: Now who will protect the kitties!?
common.score_every_satellite_desc: You wasted your life so they wouldn't waste theirs.
common.score_no_satellite_desc: No need for everybody else to be miserable, too.
common.score_every_dress_desc: You looked fetching in every cocktail dress.
common.score_every_bra_desc: You finally got the support you needed.
common.score_every_fire_escape_desc: You destroyed every fire escape on the way down.
common.score_no_fire_escape_desc: Thanks to your diligence, everybody still has a tiny unsafe balcony.
common.score_first_run_desc: You're never the same after your first time.
common.score_everything_broken_desc: Now you are become death, destroyer of sprites.
common.score_nothing_broken_desc: You made a mess without making a mess.
common.score_rounds_1000_desc: You plummeted to your virtual death 1000 times, and we're worried about you.
